duties_responsibilities.duty: Greeting and assisting patients, families, and visitors at entrances and waiting areas.
Managing multiple inquiries in a calm and professional manner.
Providing a safe environment by reading, writing, and speaking English.
Utilizing customer service and retail experience to assist effectively.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED equivalent (or obtain within 2 years of employment)
Valid working papers if 16 or 17 years old
